name: ADC AirPlay Device
description:
Inspired by the discontinuation of the HomePod hardware, which I wrote about here, this device is designed to act as an AirPlay sender/receiver. This would allow HomePods to work with analog audio sources, or convert analog speakers into AirPlay compatible ones. Working on reverse engineering the AirPlay 2 spec as Rust library on my GitHub!


Features:

  • RCA output
  • 3.5mm input
  • 128x128 OLED screen
  • USB-C power
